name: Mr Unkillable
description:
You are trapped with an angry machinegun man who won't stay dead, get as many "frags" as you can before you kick the bucket, he also has a lot of blood too! took 5 days to make hope everyone's safe at home :)

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Movement
  • Mouse - Shooting
  • R - Reload
  • E - Mag/Powerup Magnet
